name: Lucy Willis
background: Lucy Willis serves as Commissioning Editor, Factual at Channel 5. Focus areas: Documentaries, popular factual.
thematic_priorities: Behind-the-scenes access series at British institutions
accessible factual programming with broad appeal
true crime series focusing on recent British cases
observational documentary series in workplace settings
engineering and 'how things work' specialist factual
natural history focusing on British wildlife and landscapes
ancient history and archaeology with mystery/revelation elements
presenter-led specialist factual with established talent
format_specifications: Both series and one-off, depending on story and slot
budget_parameters: Documentary: £80K–£200K per hour; Specialist Factual: £90K–£180K per hour
technical_requirements: Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above.
submission_process: One-page outline with headline, premise and format
Clear indication of broad audience appeal
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach. Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen.
